metadata:
========
Series: DT.NFL.IMFN.CD

Aggregationmethod: Sum
--------
Dataset: International Debt Statistics
--------
IndicatorName: Net financial flows, IMF nonconcessional (NFL, current US$)
--------
License_Type: CC BY-4.0
--------
License_URL: https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/public-licenses#cc-by
--------
Longdefinition: Net financial flows received by the borrower during the year are disbursements of loans and credits less repayments of principal. IMF is the International Monetary Fund, which provides nonconcessional lending through the credit it provides to its members, mainly to meet balance of payments needs. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
--------
Periodicity: Annual
--------
Shortdefinition: Net financial flows received by the borrower during the year are disbursements of loans and credits less repayments of principal. IMF is the International Monetary Fund, which provides nonconcessional lending through the credit it provides to its members, mainly to meet balance of payments needs. Data are in current U.S. dollars.
--------
Source: World Bank, International Debt Statistics.
--------
Statisticalconceptandmethodology: Nonconcessional lending from the IMF is provided mainly through Stand-by Arrangements, the Flexible Credit Line, and the Extended Fund Facility.
--------
Topic: Economic Policy & Debt: External debt: Net flows
